description:
In today's Daily Fix:
It finally happened: Grand Theft Auto 5 is on Switch. Well, not really, but it's proof that it can be done. Modders took the game's source code and got it running on the Nintendo Switch. It doesn't run well, but maybe if Rockstar put some resources behind an official port, it probably maybe sort of can be done. In other news, an EA exec is  mad at Stellar Blade—not over the game itself, but that Stellar Blade is a pretty violent game, and somehow that passed the Japanese ratings board, but Dead Space didn't. And finally, we're partnering with Xbox for the next ID@Xbox Showcase, so tune in on Monday, April 29th at 10am Pacific for a look at some upcoming indie games you won't want to miss.

#IGN #Gaming #GTA
title: Modders Got GTA 5 Running on Nintendo Switch - IGN Daily Fix

description:
Bartending, a rude goddess, and the return of superheroes are what you can expect this spring anime season. There's a new season full of anime to check out this Spring like Akira Toriyama's Sand Land: The Series, the return of My Hero Academia, and the highly anticipated Kaiju No. 8. Across Crunchyroll, HIDIVE, Hulu, and Netflix, as well as others, there are a lot of places to enjoy anime at the moment. Don't forget to stick to the end of the video to see the list of Spring anime 2024 available this season. Let us know which 2024 Spring anime you're looking forward to in the comments below!

#IGN #anime
title: New Anime to Watch Spring 2024

description:
Spider-Man 4 is still happening in the MCU, with Tom Holland giving Marvel fans an update on where the creative team is at with the process. Speaking to Deadline, Holland gave a few details on the webcrawler’s legacy, #SpiderMan4 and his involvement in the creative process of the still-untitled fourth film within the #MCU: “We have the best in the business working toward whatever the story might be. But until we’ve cracked it, we have a legacy to protect. The third movie was so special in so many ways that we need to make sure we do the right thing. This is the first time in this process that I’ve been part of the creative so early. It’s just a process where I’m watching and learning. It’s just a really fun stage for me. Like I said, everyone wants it to happen. But we want to make sure we’re not overdoing the same things.” He went on to talk about how he owes his career to Spider-Man, first starring in the role back in 2016’s Captain America: Civil War film.

#IGN #Marvel #SpiderMan
title: Tom Holland Gives An Update on Spider-Man 4's Creative Direction - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

description:
Dead Island 2 is available now on Steam, along with the Haus and SoLA story expansions. Watch the Dead Island 2 Steam launch trailer for Dead Island 2 to see brutal zombie slaying combat from this first-person action RPG.

In Dead Island 2, a deadly virus has transformed the city's inhabitants into flesh-craving monsters. But you're not just another survivor; you're immune to the infection. Embark on a quest to uncover the truth behind the outbreak, while defining your identity in this post-apocalyptic realm.

Prepare yourself for intense action as you scavenge for resources, craft weapons and fend off the zombie hordes. Sharpen your machetes, stock up on med kits and don't forget the sunscreen, because the battle for survival in HELL-A is about to get scorching hot.

#Gaming #Zombies #IGN
title: Dead Island 2 - Official Steam Launch Trailer

description:
Here's your look at The Whims of the Gods in this announcement trailer for the upcoming city-builder game that's coming to Early Access on PC in Q3 2024. The Whims of the Gods is a cooperation-focused city-builder in which players are tasked with constructing and managing an ancient city. In addition to constructing buildings, they will have to satisfy the needs of their citizens and defend against aggressors emerging from the volcano at the heart of the island.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
title: The Whims of the Gods - Official Announcement Trailer
The cast and crew react to YOUR comments on the Boy Kills World trailer!Presented by @RoadsideFlix

description:
Prince Zuko from Avatar: The Last Airbender joins Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 in the newest DLC, available on April 24, 2024. Watch the latest trailer for Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 to see Zuko in action, including a breakdown of his abilities and more.

#Nickelodeon #Gaming #IGN
title: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 - Official Zuko Spotlight Trailer

description:
Watch the Boy Kills World cast including Famke Janssen, Brett Gelman, Sharlto Copley, and Isaiah Mustafa react to IGN comments! We showed the Boy Kills World cast some of our favorite comments that you posted on the BKW Official Trailer... Here's what they had to say.
Boy Kills World opens in theaters on April 26th, 2024.

Presented by Boy Kills World
title: Boy Kills World Cast React to IGN Comments

description:
Watch The Watchers trailer for the upcoming film starring Dakota Fanning (“Once Upon a Time in Hollywood,” “Ocean’s Eight”), Georgina Campbell (“Barbarian,” “Suspicion”), Oliver Finnegan (“Creeped Out,” “Outlander”) and Olwen Fouere (“The Northman,” “The Tourist”).

From producer M. Night Shyamalan comes The Watchers, written for the screen and directed by Ishana Night Shyamalan and based on the novel by A.M. Shine. The film follows Mina, a 28-year-old artist, who gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are watched and stalked by mysterious creatures each night.

You can’t see them, but they see everything.

The film is produced by M. Night Shyamalan, Ashwin Rajan and Nimitt Mankad. The executive producers are Jo Homewood and Stephen Dembitzer.

New Line Cinema presents The Watchers, set to open in theaters internationally June 12 2024 and in North America on June 14, 202
title: The Watchers - Official Trailer (2024) Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell

description:
Check out the Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game announcement trailer for the upcoming Hobbit life sim set in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth.

From Wētā Workshop, known for their work on the world of Middle-earth in The Lord of the Rings film trilogy, Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game invites players to experience the storybook return of living life as a Hobbit in the idyllic town of Bywater. Unwind in the breathtaking pastures, visit the townsfolks’ local shops, or even enjoy second breakfast. Help bring the community together and achieve official village status by throwing the greatest Bywater Festival the Shire has ever seen.

Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game will be released in the second half of 2024 on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam.

#LordOfTheRings #Gaming #IGN
title: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Bill Skarsgård stars as "Boy" who vows revenge after his family is murdered by Hilda Van Der Koy (Famke Janssen), the deranged matriarch of a corrupt post-apocalyptic dynasty that left the boy orphaned, deaf and voiceless. 

Driven by his inner voice (H. Jon Benjamin), one which he co-opted from his favorite childhood video game, Boy trains with a mysterious shaman (Yayan Ruhian) to become an instrument of death and is set loose on the eve of the annual culling of dissidents. Bedlam ensues as Boy commits bloody martial arts mayhem, inciting a wrath of carnage and blood-letting. 

As he tries to get his bearings in this delirious realm, Boy soon falls in with a desperate resistance group, all the while bickering with the apparent ghost of his rebellious little sister.

Director Moritz Mohr's Boy Kills World opens in theaters on April 26, 2024.

#BoyKillsWorld #Clip #IGN
title: Boy Kills World - Exclusive Fight Scene Clip (2024) Bill Skarsgård, Jessica Rothe, and Brett Gelman

description:
Enjoy the final trailer for the imminent JRPG Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes ahead of its launch tomorrow, April 23, for all platforms: PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox (including Xbox Game Pass).

#EiyudenChronicleHundredHeroes #IGN #Gaming
title: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes – Official Launch Trailer

description:
Take a look at enemies, gameplay, and more in this trailer for Afterblast, an upcoming FPS rogue-lite action game that can be played solo or in co-op, and randomly generated dungeons. In Afterblast, you can obtain powerful abilities and weapons, and you must find a way to save your planet. Stand up against the gods and defeat hordes of monsters in Afterblast when the game launches on PC.

#Afterblast #Gameplay #IGN #Gaming
title: Afterblast - Official Gameplay Trailer

description:
Ever since Game of Thrones became the standard bearer for contemporary prestige TV, it's been an inevitability that each network is looking for that one show that could become "The Next Game of Thrones." No one can ever truly predict what will catch fire and become a prestige TV smash, but that’s where Shōgun on FX comes in. 

The Shōgun TV show has kept fans in awe, with Shōgun episode 8 and Shōgun episode 9 taking things to the next level at every turn. Hiroyuki Sanada is inspired as Yoshii Toranaga, and Anna Sawai’s Lady Mariko has easily won the heart of the internet. Cosmo Jarvis’ John Blackthorne has even wiggled his way in there as well! 

Now, with the Shōgun finale around the corner, it seems like it’s time to finally call it: Shōgun is everything Game of Thrones should have been.

#Shogun #TV #IGN
title: Shōgun Is Everything Game of Thrones Should Have Been

description:
Check out the House of Golf 2 announcement trailer for the upcoming sequel to House of Golf, which was released on Nintendo Switch in 2019. The new arcade sports game is developed with Unreal Engine 5, featuring over 100 courses, weekly tournaments, and more. It will also launch with local four-player multiplayer support.
House of Golf 2 is coming to PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S in Summer 2024.

#HouseOfGolf2 #IGN #Gaming
title: House of Golf 2 - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Check out the teaser trailer for Starlight Games' untitled futuristic sports game. Stay tuned over the coming months to learn more about this new sports game, developed in Unreal Engine 5, directed by WipEout co-creator Nick Burcombe.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
title: Untitled Futuristic Sports Game (Starlight Games) - Official Teaser Trailer

description:
Watch the Deadpool & Wolverine trailer for the next MCU movie, starring Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman, Emma Corrin, Morena Baccarin, Rob Delaney, and more.

Wolverine is recovering from his injuries when he crosses paths with the loudmouth, Deadpool. They team up to defeat a common enemy.

The film is directed by Shawn Levy and written by Shawn Levy, Rhett Reese, and Ryan Reynolds.

Deadpool & Wolverine releases in theaters on July 26, 2024.

#Deadpool #Marvel #Movies
title: Deadpool & Wolverine - Official Trailer (2024) Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman

description:
Get your first proper look at gameplay from Island of Winds, a new action/adventure/puzzle game set in a fantastical version of 17th-century Iceland where you'll explore an emotional narrative, cast spells, and face off against mythical monsters. Island of Winds is due out later this year for PC and consoles.

#IslandOfWinds #Gameplay #IGN #Gaming
title: Island of Winds - Exclusive First Gameplay Trailer

description: Ubisoft's The Crew is now unplayable for all owners after the massive open-world racer was shut down permanently on March 31, 2024. With no offline functionality, even for solo play, it is no longer possible for any player to access their saves or purchased DLC. Here's one last slice of preserved gameplay from The Crew, in the form of one final trip across the map – from New York to Seattle the long way.
title: The Crew 2014-2024: One Last Ride
